ingredients.ingredient: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix

cookingTips: Pat shrimp dry before folding into dip to prevent excess moisture
Mix ingredients gently to keep shrimp pieces intact
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving for flavors to set
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's a quick but impressive cold shrimp dip for entertaining?
